docs.snippet: "Amicable suits" are all the rage. I wrote you a while ago that there was some prospect of trouble between the incumbents of the municipal offices and the men newly elected to the places.

headline.main: FROM CALIFORNIA.; Millenial Management--An Era of Amicable Suits--Merry Method of our Sovereign Squatters--Dave Scannell, Chief of the Firemen--Just One Murder-State Messenger Weeks--The End of Delazon Smith--Where Gwin Gained a Point, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: "Amicable suits" are all the rage. I wrote you a while ago that there was some prospect of trouble between the incumbents of the municipal offices and the men newly elected to the places.
